Package Controllers

Class AppointmentDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controllers.AppointmentDetails
  • public class AppointmentDetails
extends java.lang.Object
    Appointment Details Screen. Creates/Updates Appointments.

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        void initialize()
        Initializes the Appointment Details Screen. Initializes the Date & Time Pickers, and ComboBoxes.

      • initializeDatePickers

        private void initializeDatePickers()
        Initializes the DatePickers.

      • initializeComboBoxes

        private void initializeComboBoxes()
        Initializes the Contact ComboBox & Customer ComboBox.

      • datePickerInitialDate

        private java.time.LocalDate datePickerInitialDate()
        Checks the current time, if after 22:00 then returns the next day.
        Returns:
        LocalDate of either today or the next.

      • startTimePickerInit

        private void startTimePickerInit()
        Initializes the Start Time ComboBox.

      • endTimePickerInit

        private void endTimePickerInit()
        Initializes the End Time ComboBox.

      • initializeData

        public void initializeData​(Appointment appointment,
                           javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> customers,
                           java.util.function.Consumer<Appointment> onComplete)
        Initializes Data coming from the Calendar Controller.
        Parameters:
        appointment - Appointment to be updated, if present.
        customers - List of customers to add to appointment.
        onComplete - Consumer to return the new/updated appointment.

      • loadContacts

        private void loadContacts()
        Retrieves all Contacts from Database.

      • loadUsers

        private void loadUsers()
        Retrieves all Users from Database.

      • loadStartEndTimes

        private void loadStartEndTimes()
        Creates start and end times in EST then converts back to System Default Time.

      • setNewAppointmentTimes

        private void setNewAppointmentTimes()
        Sets the initial appointment times to the next quarter increment. Maybe overridden by an incoming appointment to be updated.

      • loadAppointment

        private void loadAppointment​(Appointment appointment)
        Loads the appointment passed in from the Calendar Controller.

      • cancel

        void cancel()
        Checks to see if the user wants to cancel the current action. If true closes current screen, otherwise returns to screen.

      • submit

        void submit()
        Passes back the appointment, to Calendar controller to be added to the Database, then closes the window.

      • extractAppointmentDetails

        private Appointment extractAppointmentDetails()
        Extracts the appointment details from the window, and either updates the Existing Appointment or creates a new Appointment Object.
        Returns:
        Appointment Object to be added to the calendar.
